oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Third Annual Nashville River Stages
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Allman Brothers Band; Hart, Beth; Blind Boys of Alabama; BR549 (Musical group); Gov't Mule (Musical group); Indigo Girls (Musical group); Jump, Little Children (Musical group); Newman, Randy; Katies (Musical group); Widespread Panic (Musical group); Woodcuts (prints);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Three color window card (black, blue, and yellow on white) announcing the Third Annual Nashville River Stages featuring the Allman Brothers Band, Beth Hart, Bjorn Again, A Tribute to Abba, Blind Boys of Alabama, BR5-49, Bryan Adams, Coco Montoya, David Mead, Edwin McCain, Getaway People, Gov't Mule, Indigo Girls, Joe 90, Jump, Little Children, Lokomotiv, Magic School Bus, Meshell Ndeocello, Peter Searcy, Randy Newman, Ratdog, Robert Bradley's Blackwater Surprise, Shannon Curfman, Splender, Strangefolk, the Katies, War, and Widespread Panic in downtown Nashville, Tennessee on May 5-7. Poster features a woodcut of the Nashville skyline.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Edan Bryant;
